attributes.action: Require all arrests of women to be conducted by a female officer
attributes.additional_details: To protect female civilians against brutality from male police officers such as inappropriate touching, violence, rape and murder.
attributes.background: Introduce legislation to protect women against rogue male police officers whereby all physical contact between a female civilian and a police officer is conducted by female police officers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598246
